meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Katie Collins Scott Mitchell Kristin Morgan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6522.

td.p: Katie Collins, a U.S. Army Reserve family support assistant from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Scott Mitchell, a technical project manager from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,600)
Kristin Morgan, a strategic analyst for NASA from Huntsville, Alabama (whose 4-day cash winnings total $39,098)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"The Sexiest Man Alive! (1992)": Nick Nolte')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 14):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: (In spite of the fact that the draw has,uh, Kristin, as a NASA strategic analyst.)
(We want [*] whatever we give you in the clue.)

$8,000
Seattle')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans.
